short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chat with users on the same webpage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TabTalk transforms your browsing experience by letting you instantly chat with others on the same webpage—no sign-in or account needed. Whether you're sharing opinions on an article, discussing a podcast, or just want to connect with like-minded people, TabTalk makes it easy. It’s a fast, secure, and private way to make conversations happen right where you’re browsing. Install TabTalk to start real-time discussions, make connections, and bring social interaction to your browsing like never before!
